Main content starts here, tab to start navigating
About Us
Opened in February 2013 at Delray Marketplace, Burt & Max's is the go-to Delray Beach restaurant for locals. As a cherished favorite, we offer a cozy, modern setting for lunch, brunch, dinner, and happy hour. Our menu boasts classic and innovative American dishes and continental favorites. Explore options from sharing plates to signature entrees, prime burgers, and brick oven pizzas. Join us for outdoor dining in Delray Beach, and discover why we're the preferred choice in the community for the whole family; kids menus and doggie menus available!
Check out our most recent media features and accolades, including recognitions for the Best Burger, and more!
Press
Awards & Accolades
For media inquiries or more information, send requests to: Apollitt@rapoportsrg.com.
